description: Indegap is a scientific and technological company based in Mendoza, Argentina, focused on providing applied knowledge to agricultural businesses. By utilizing advanced sensors and data analysis, Indegap helps reduce uncertainty in agricultural investments, enabling producers to make safer, more informed decisions. With a range of services, particularly in microclimate studies, Indegap aims to enhance profitability and sustainability in agriculture, ultimately benefiting the food supply chain and the environment.
name: Indegap
